title: Waymo Reaches 20 Million Passenger Trips
description:
Waymo reached a huge milestone today. It passed 20 million passenger trips. On antisocial media site X (where Waymo likes to make this kind of announcement), the company wrote: “20 million. That’s how many times you’ve trusted Waymo to get you where you’re going. “Today, we’ve officially surpassed 20 million ... [continued]
